page.title: 03ANTIQUE SHOPS
page.content: There are{32}antique shops in Stow which is just over a{third}of all the shops. There are a lot of antique shops in Stow and in the nearby towns because it is in the{heart of England which makes it easy for customers to come. There is a wide variety of shops, each one having its own speciality.{"Touchwood Antiques" specialises in{furniture}from medieval to about 1720. Many customers come from abroad, mainly America, but the best customers are the English. Most shops are members of the{Cotswold {Antique Dealers' Association.}Trade is at its busiest during the summer when Tourism is at its height. Saturdays are busiest. Occasionally wealthy Americans come and buy large quantities for{exporting}to America.
